OOC: It's okay, the base might as well be destroyed, I only have 2 bots in
it, and am going to get them out.

BIC: Airbomber and Time Warp exit the base and see battle. They hide...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 23, 2000 12:00 AM
Subject: Re: War


> SoulStice, if the base has special shields that would make this move
> impossible, please tell me and I'll rewrite. I'm assuming the Mafia base
has
> similar shields to the other bases, but its your base. If you object, I'll
> void this post.
>
> ::Bloodystrike/Reptilica::
>
> Reptilica dives out of the way, a few shots hitting him but the rest
heading
> for the autogun that he had been firing at.
>
> "Let's get otta here!" he yells to Bloodystrike, jumping away from the
base.
> He passes through the shield, most of his remaining armor melting away at
the
> energy. His jetpack sputters a bit before activating again, sending him
> flying, rather uncontrollably, in the direction of the Alliance base,
barely
> managing to stay conscious.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike yells in pain as he attempts, but fails, to completely dodge
> Sharpedge's sword. Following Reptilica's example, he jumps through the
> shield, taking off toward the Alliance base.
>
> Being less damaged, he gets through easier than Reptilica.
>
>
>
>
